summary: The file defines several lightweight neural modules with different configurations (basic linear, exportable, adapter mixin, explicit neural types) and a test suite that checks whether these modules can be scripted with PyTorch JIT, exported, and executed correctly, ensuring compatibility across type annotations and mixins.
business_intent: Validate and guarantee that neural components within the framework remain compatible with PyTorch JIT compilation and export processes, supporting reliable model deployment and integration of adapter extensions.
